meta.title: New York City District # 8 - Bronx, NY

meta.name: viewport

div.span: (i.e. School or District Name, City, Zip)

div.p: New York City District # 8 Community Board fully supports all the schools within its district. District # 8 is a massive school system and it is also home to Hunter College. A longstanding concern of Community Board 8 has been the lack of recognition on the part of the City and the State of the number of programs that serve large numbers of non-resident youth. Community Board 8 supports the restoration of funding for student tuition subsidies for the City University of New York. The Board also recognizes the importance of providing adequate day care and after school facilities for the children. There are many Community Board 8 residents, especially single working parents, who need affordable day care and after school programs, but whose income slightly surpasses eligibility requirements.
